channel.title: UCTD on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in UCTD on Damien Saunders

item.title: 2019 Where am I?
item.description: Hi there. Well here’s something new I didn’t expect … I have just found out I have an autoimmune disease - undifferentiated connective tissue disease or UCTD. I need to do some research and find out more about this …
